mapper.insert:
select nextval('SEQ_B');
merger into I_PMS_RECEIPT_INFO t1 using (select #{CITY_NAME} CITY_NAME, #{RECEIPT_ID} RECEIPT_ID from dual) t2 on (t1.RECEIPT_ID=t2.RECEIPT_ID) when matched then update set t1.CITY_NAME=#{CITY_NAME}, t1.COUNTY_NAME=#{COUNTY_NAME}, t1.CITY_NAME=#{CITY_NAME}, t1.COUNTY_NAME=#{COUNTY_NAME}, t1.SITE_NAME=#{SITE_NAME}, t1.SITE_NO=#{SITE_NO}, t1.METER_NUM=#{METER_NUM}, t1.MONTH_ID=#{MONTH_ID}, t1.READING_START=#{READING_START}, t1.READING_END=#{READING_END}, t1.MONTHLY_POWER=#{MONTHLY_POWER}, t1.READING_START_TIME=#{READING_START_TIME}, t1.READING_END_TIME=#{READING_END_TIME}, t1.AVG_POWER=#{AVG_POWER}, t1.CONTRACT_NO=#{CONTRACT_NO}, t1.ELEC_PRICE=#{ELEC_PRICE}, t1.ELEC_AMT=#{ELEC_AMT}, t1.AVG_AMT=#{AVG_AMT}, t1.ATTACHMENT_ID=#{ATTACHMENT_ID}, t1.ATTACHMENT_ID_RECEIPT=#{ATTACHMENT_ID_RECEIPT}, t1.ELEC_LOSE=#{ELEC_LOSE}, t1.ELEC_TOTAL=#{ELEC_TOTAL}, t1.SETTLE_POWER=#{SETTLE_POWER}, t1.PROVINCE=#{PROVINCE}, t1.OWNER_CUST_CODE=#{OWNER_CUST_CODE}, t1.INT_ID=#{INT_ID}, t1.CREATE_USER=#{CREATE_USER}, t1.CREATE_TIME=#{CREATE_TIME}, t1.UPDATE_USER=#{UPDATE_USER}, t1.UPDATE_TME=#{UPDATE_TME} where t1.RECEIPT_ID=#{RECEIPT_ID} when not matched then insert ( t1.CITY_NAME, t1.COUNTY_NAME, t1.SITE_NAME, t1.SITE_NO, t1.METER_NUM, t1.MONTH_ID, t1.READING_START, t1.READING_END, t1.MONTHLY_POWER, t1.READING_START_TIME, t1.READING_END_TIME, t1.AVG_POWER, t1.CONTRACT_NO, t1.ELEC_PRICE, t1.ELEC_AMT, t1.AVG_AMT, t1.ATTACHMENT_ID, t1.ATTACHMENT_ID_RECEIPT, t1.ELEC_LOSE, t1.ELEC_TOTAL, t1.RECEIPT_ID, t1.SETTLE_POWER, t1.PROVINCE, t1.OWNER_CUST_CODE, t1.INT_ID, t1.CREATE_USER, t1.CREATE_TIME, t1.UPDATE_USER, t1.UPDATE_TME ) values ( #{CITY_NAME}, #{COUNTY_NAME}, #{SITE_NAME}, #{SITE_NO}, #{METER_NUM}, #{MONTH_ID}, #{READING_START}, #{READING_END}, #{MONTHLY_POWER}, #{READING_START_TIME}, #{READING_END_TIME}, #{AVG_POWER}, #{CONTRACT_NO}, #{ELEC_PRICE}, #{ELEC_AMT}, #{AVG_AMT}, #{ATTACHMENT_ID}, #{ATTACHMENT_ID_RECEIPT}, #{ELEC_LOSE}, #{ELEC_TOTAL}, #{RECEIPT_ID}, #{SETTLE_POWER}, #{PROVINCE}, #{OWNER_CUST_CODE}, #{id}, #{CREATE_USER}, #{CREATE_TIME}, #{UPDATE_USER}, #{UPDATE_TME )
